app.name: Zakaty
landing.verseLine1: خُذْ مِنْ أَمْوَالِهِمْ صَدَقَةً تُطَهِّرُهُمْ وَتُزَكِّيهِم بِهَا
landing.verseLine2: وَصَلِّ عَلَيْهِمْ ۖ إِنَّ صَلَاتَكَ سَكَنٌ لَّهُمْ ۗ وَاللَّهُ سَمِيعٌ عَلِيمٌ
landing.verseTranslation: Take from their wealth a charity to purify them and increase them thereby, and pray for them. Indeed, your prayers are a comfort for them. And Allah is All-Hearing, All-Knowing.
